data.title: The Hidden Society: Vilhelm Aubert (Social Science Classics)
data.meta_description: The Hidden Society: Vilhelm Aubert (Social Science Classics) by Aubert, Vilhelm - ISBN 10: 087855730X - ISBN 13: 9780878557301 - Routledge - 1982 - Softcover
data.text:
."..those who seek insight and rich hypothesis--starting points "for further "study--will be well rewarded."

-- Choice

"There is "a freshness of treatment, "and an inventiveness and fertility "of "method that produce an "effect very much like the "opening "of "a window."

-- R.B. Perry, Saturday Review of Literature
